message: How do I make a group member an Admin?
@craig If you are an admin yourself, you can go to Group actions -> Members list and then there are the make admin / remove admin buttons next to every name.
@KojiKodama100 That is definitely a bug. I'm not seeing that...what browser and OS are you using?

The "Make admin" link just points to "https://convore.com/.../members/#" and just reproduces the membership page for the group. I.e., no action done to make a particular person an admin. BUG? I'm assuming that as an admin, the expected result of clicking on "make admin" next to a group member's name will make them an additional admin, and not remove me as such in the process.
Thanks, Eric -- wow, quick response! Browser = IE 8.0.7600... and OS = Win7Pro 32-bit
Thanks, I'll see if I can reproduce that problem
